articles.author: Ritika Sharma
articles.title: Cyber fraud ring busted in Delhi, 12 arrested for duping people via fake job portals
articles.description: Police uncovered a large cybercrime syndicate operating from multiple cities targeting unemployed youth.
articles.content: Police arrested 12 suspects from Delhi and Gurugram who were running fake job recruitment websites...

articles.author: John Keane
articles.title: Massive data breach hits global bank, 3 million customer records leaked
articles.description: Hackers breached a multinational bank’s database, exposing millions of personal and financial records.
articles.content: The financial regulator has ordered an urgent investigation into the breach...

articles.author: Sahil Verma
articles.title: Mumbai jewelry heist: Police recover ₹1.2 crore worth of stolen gold
articles.description: A gang of three was arrested for robbing a jewelry shop in Dadar last week.
articles.content: Mumbai crime branch officials tracked the suspects using CCTV footage and digital payments data...

articles.author: Sara Jacobs
articles.title: Interpol launches global operation against human trafficking
articles.description: Interpol rescued over 300 victims and arrested 120 suspects in an anti-trafficking operation across 25 countries.
articles.content: The coordinated action targeted smuggling networks and child exploitation rings...

articles.author: Neha Menon
articles.title: Kerala police arrest man for cryptocurrency scam worth ₹80 lakh
articles.description: The accused promised high returns through a fake crypto investment platform.
articles.content: Cyber cell officials traced digital wallets and froze ₹45 lakh worth of crypto assets...

articles.author: Rachel Thomas
articles.title: UK police seize record haul of illegal weapons in London raids
articles.description: Metropolitan police uncovered over 500 firearms and arrested 24 individuals linked to organized crime.
articles.content: The week-long operation targeted gang violence hotspots across the city...

articles.author: Alex Rivera
articles.title: US court sentences hacker to 10 years for ransomware attacks on hospitals
articles.description: The cybercriminal caused major disruptions to healthcare services during 2023.
articles.content: The Department of Justice emphasized that critical infrastructure attacks would face harsh penalties...

articles.author: Rajeev Singh
articles.title: Fake passport racket busted in Kolkata; 8 arrested
articles.description: The accused created fake passports for illegal immigration using forged documents.
articles.content: Officials seized 200 fake documents and 15 blank passports from the suspects’ possession...

articles.author: Ananya Gupta
articles.title: UP: Police rescue kidnapped child within 24 hours, two held
articles.description: Swift police action led to safe rescue of a 6-year-old boy abducted for ransom in Lucknow.
articles.content: Police tracked the kidnappers through cell tower triangulation and road CCTV...

articles.author: Priya Ramesh
articles.title: Pune techie duped of ₹9 lakh in online trading scam
articles.description: Victim was lured by fake Telegram trading group promising daily returns.
articles.content: Cyber police warn public against unsolicited financial advice through social media platforms...

articles.author: Amit Desai
articles.title: Illegal sand mining racket exposed in Bihar, officials suspended
articles.description: District administration found local officers colluding with mining mafia.
articles.content: Over 30 trucks of illegally mined sand were seized during the raid...

articles.author: Emily Norton
articles.title: Europol arrests 45 suspects in international drug smuggling operation
articles.description: The operation spanned across Spain, France, and Italy targeting a Balkan cartel.
articles.content: Authorities seized 2 tonnes of cocaine and €5 million in cash...

articles.author: Asha Patil
articles.title: Pune builder arrested for money laundering under PMLA
articles.description: The Enforcement Directorate has attached assets worth ₹25 crore.
articles.content: The accused allegedly diverted housing funds for personal luxury investments...

articles.author: Sneha Das
articles.title: Bengaluru police crack ATM skimming case, arrest two foreign nationals
articles.description: Citizens had reported unauthorized withdrawals from their bank accounts.
articles.content: The accused used hidden skimming devices on ATMs across multiple locations...

articles.author: Liam Johnson
articles.title: Interpol issues Red Corner notice for fugitive cybercrime kingpin
articles.description: The suspect is accused of leading a large phishing and dark web fraud network.
articles.content: Interpol has requested cooperation from multiple Asian and European countries...

articles.author: Deepak Sinha
articles.title: Delhi police busts fake loan app scam, 20 arrested
articles.description: Fraudsters extorted money by threatening borrowers using their personal data.
articles.content: Over 50 mobile phones and 100 SIM cards were seized from the suspects...

articles.author: Anil Kumar
articles.title: Chandigarh police arrest three in chain snatching spree
articles.description: Multiple women targeted in broad daylight; gang caught using traffic cameras.
articles.content: Police said the group was involved in more than 15 incidents across Tricity...

articles.author: David Lee
articles.title: FBI arrests man for planning cyberattack on energy grid
articles.description: The suspect allegedly tried to recruit hackers online to disrupt power systems.
articles.content: FBI cyber division said the threat was neutralized before causing real harm...

articles.author: Shreya Iyer
articles.title: Maharashtra police bust illegal betting racket worth ₹5 crore
articles.description: The racket operated through WhatsApp and Telegram during IPL season.
articles.content: Several laptops and mobile phones were recovered; investigation is ongoing...
